column1: The wolf and the wild boar were first on the ground; and when they espied their enemies coming
column2: and saw the cat's long tail standing straight in the air
column3: they thought she was carrying a sword for Sultan to fight with; and every time she limped
column4: they thought she was picking up a stone to throw at them; so they said they should not like this way of fighting
column5: and the boar lay down behind a bush
column6: and the wolf jumped up into a tree. Sultan and the cat soon came up
column7: and looked about and wondered that no one was there. The boar
